subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham’s move to Paris St.-Germain in January created a buzz, but it was hardly a footnote in the larger narrative about the club: It suddenly has a credit card with no limit.
snippet: David Beckham’s move to Paris St.-Germain in January created a buzz, but it was hardly a footnote in the larger narrative about the club: It suddenly has a credit card with no limit.
